caption:
100 winners! 💵 THIS IS NOT A DRILL! 🚨
 
While a Nurses Week giveaway won’t fix staffing issues or burnout, it sure can bring a little joy into your day! 🌈
 
Nurses deserve to be celebrated every day and if you know Diana from @catalystforselfcare or any of these incredible brands you know that we deeply believe that YOU come first! Human first always!
 
This Nurses Week @thenursingbeat, the only daily digital newsletter for nurses, by nurses, has partnered with @CeraVe, @connectRN, and @Subway, who all stand with you and want to give you some gifts to help you practice self-care and put yourself first!

✨ 40 nurses will win a CeraVe gift box (valued at over $100) - @CeraVe therapeutic skincare, such as cleansers and facial and body lotions, along with a few other gifted nurse essentials and self-care items! I have used these products for YEARS and…obsessed. 

✨ 20 nurses will win a $100 Amex gift card from @connectRN - Use @connectrn to snag the per diem shifts that actually work for you and your work-life balance, and use this Amex cash-ola for that massage you OH SO desperately need! 

✨ 40 nurses will win a $25 @Subway gift card -To make sure you and your unit aren’t skipping lunch! (Their new wraps are *chefs kiss* and they have your catering needs covered) 

Enter at the link in bio and comment down below which prize you are most excited about! 
 
Good luck and happy Nurses Week, friends!!
 
Giveaway not associated with Meta. Giveaway ends 5/12 2359 EST. Winners will be contacted after the giveaway closes via email. Winners must be located in the US & 18 years or older at the time of entry. By entering, you agree to The Nursing Beat’s Giveaway Terms & Conditions.

#CeraVepartner #connectRNpartner #Subwaypartner #sponsored
